# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs. It's a high-quality item that truly stands out in its category. Given its exceptional value and features, I believe it would be a great addition to your collection. For this unique opportunity, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $140. This offer is tailored to ensure you get the best deal while also allowing me to appreciate the product's true worth. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $140. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $140
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
